Title: Duplicate Advisory: JavaScript execution via malicious molfiles (XSS)
Description:
## Duplicate Advisory
This advisory has been withdrawn because it is a duplicate of GHSA-2pwh-52h7-7j84. This link is maintained to preserve external references.

## Original Description
MolecularFaces before 0.3.0 is vulnerable to cross site scripting. A remote attacker can execute arbitrary JavaScript in the context of a victim browser via crafted molfiles.
